alert.note: Alert for Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Manatee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:14PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Manatee and northwestern Sarasota Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 514 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sarasota Bradenton Airport, or near Sarasota, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sarasota, Bradenton, Palmetto, Ellenton, South Bradenton, Saint Armands Key, North Sarasota, Memphis, West Bradenton, Kensington Park, Sarasota Bradenton Airport, West Samoset, The Meadows, Holmes Beach, Bradenton Beach, Bayshore Gardens, Cortez, Whitney Beach, Samoset and Desoto Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Manatee
